title: Potion of see invisible
data:
**[English]()** • [中文（中国大陆）‎](/wiki/Potion_of_see_invisible/zh-CN "Potion of see invisible/zh-CN")

| ! [![Pink potion.png](/images/7/79/Pink_potion.png)](/wiki/File:Pink_potion.png) |                                                               |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name                                                                             | see invisible                                                 |
| Appearance                                                                       | [random](/wiki/Randomised_appearance "Randomised appearance") |
| Base price                                                                       | 50 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                              |
| Weight                                                                           | 20                                                            |
| Monster use                                                                      | *Will not be used by monsters.*                               |

A **potion of see invisible** is a type of [potion](/wiki/Potion "Potion") that appears in *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)
  - [1.1 Alchemy](#Alchemy)
- [2 Description](#Description)
- [3 Strategy](#Strategy)
  - [3.1 Identification](#Identification)
- [4 Messages](#Messages)
- [5 References](#References)

## Generation

### Alchemy

Potions of see invisible may be obtained through [alchemy](/wiki/Alchemy "Alchemy"), by mixing [fruit juice](/wiki/Potion_of_fruit_juice "Potion of fruit juice") with either [gain level](/wiki/Potion_of_gain_level "Potion of gain level") or [gain energy](/wiki/Potion_of_gain_energy "Potion of gain energy").

## Description

- *Main article: [See invisible](/wiki/See_invisible "See invisible")*

Quaffing a potion of see invisible confers the [see invisible](/wiki/See_invisible "See invisible") intrinsic, which lets you see [invisible](/wiki/Invisible "Invisible") monsters, with its effects dependent on [beatitude](/wiki/Beatitude "Beatitude"): a cursed or uncursed potions gives you the intrinsic for 750-849 turns, while a blessed one gives you the intrinsic permanently.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) Non-cursed potions also cure [blindness](/wiki/Blindness "Blindness").[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)

[Cancelling](/wiki/Cancel "Cancel") a potion of see invisible will turn it into a potion of fruit juice.

## Strategy

After you have permanently obtained intrinsic see invisible (typically from a blessed potion), these potions are a prime candidate for [dilution](/wiki/Dilution "Dilution"). [Foodless](/wiki/Foodless "Foodless") players may want to cancel these potions to gain nutrition from the resulting fruit juice.

### Identification

The potions of see invisible and fruit juice share [exactly the same messages](/wiki/Potion_of_fruit_juice#Messages "Potion of fruit juice") (a reference to the game [Rogue](/wiki/Rogue_\(game\) "Rogue (game)")). This makes them quite difficult to tell apart by random [quaffing](/wiki/Quaff "Quaff"); it is recommended to type-[name](/wiki/Name "Name") both potions so that you can rename them later if one is identified. Some ways to identify a potion of see invisible include quaffing them while blind, with see invisible curing the blindness, and looking for previously invisible monsters that suddenly become visible. [Enlightenment](/wiki/Enlightenment "Enlightenment") after quaffing a suspected potion will reveal if you have the intrinsic.

## Messages

Aside from the messages shared with the potion of fruit juice, there are other messages relevant to the potion of see invisible.

- You can see through yourself, but you are visible!

  You quaffed the potion while invisible.

- Gee! All of a sudden, you can see right through yourself.

  You became invisible after you obtained the see invisible intrinsic.

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/potion.c in NetHack 3.6.6, line 778](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.6_Released/src/potion.c#L778)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/potion.c in NetHack 3.6.6, line 772](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.6_Released/src/potion.c#L772)

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.6. Click here for more information.](/images/5/57/Nh366-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.6. Click here for more information.")
html:
Potion of see invisible

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
English

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
!
Name see invisible
Appearance random
Base price 50 zm
Weight 20
Monster use Will not be used by monsters.

A potion of see invisible is a type of potion that appears in NetHack.

Contents

  • 1 Generation
    • 1.1 Alchemy
  • 2 Description
  • 3 Strategy
    • 3.1 Identification
  • 4 Messages
  • 5 References

Generation

Alchemy

Potions of see invisible may be obtained through alchemy, by mixing fruit juice with either gain level or gain energy.

Description

Main article: See invisible

Quaffing a potion of see invisible confers the see invisible intrinsic, which lets you see invisible monsters, with its effects dependent on beatitude: a cursed or uncursed potions gives you the intrinsic for 750-849 turns, while a blessed one gives you the intrinsic permanently.[1] Non-cursed potions also cure blindness.[2]

Cancelling a potion of see invisible will turn it into a potion of fruit juice.

Strategy

After you have permanently obtained intrinsic see invisible (typically from a blessed potion), these potions are a prime candidate for dilution. Foodless players may want to cancel these potions to gain nutrition from the resulting fruit juice.

Identification

The potions of see invisible and fruit juice share exactly the same messages (a reference to the game Rogue). This makes them quite difficult to tell apart by random quaffing; it is recommended to type-name both potions so that you can rename them later if one is identified. Some ways to identify a potion of see invisible include quaffing them while blind, with see invisible curing the blindness, and looking for previously invisible monsters that suddenly become visible. Enlightenment after quaffing a suspected potion will reveal if you have the intrinsic.

Messages

Aside from the messages shared with the potion of fruit juice, there are other messages relevant to the potion of see invisible.

You can see through yourself, but you are visible!
You quaffed the potion while invisible.
Gee! All of a sudden, you can see right through yourself.
You became invisible after you obtained the see invisible intrinsic.

References

  1. ↑ src/potion.c in NetHack 3.6.6, line 778
  2. ↑ src/potion.c in NetHack 3.6.6, line 772
